Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

interrupted by card breaks -- and move card break past close tag of sp

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
l: morfh\n d' a)mei/yas e)k qeou= brothsi/an
o(rw= de\ mhtro\s mnh=ma th=s kerauni/as
to/d' e)ggu\s oi)/kwn kai\ do/mwn e)rei/pia

l.#text: ai)nw= de\ *ka/dmon, a)/baton o(\s pe/don to/de

l: ti/qhsi, qugatro\s shko/n: a)mpe/lou de/ nin

l.#text: *ba/ktria/ te tei/xh th/n te du/sximon xqo/na

l: *)asi/an te pa=san, h(\ par' a(lmura\n a(/la
teleta/s, i(/n' ei)/hn e)mfanh\s dai/mwn brotoi=s.

l.#text: qu/rson te dou\s e)s xei=ra, ki/ssinon be/los:

l: e)pei/ m' a)delfai\ mhtro/s, a(\s h(/kista xrh=n,
toiga/r nin au)ta\s e)k do/mwn w)/|strhs' e)gw\
mani/ais, o)/ros d' oi)kou=si para/kopoi frenw=n:
skeuh/n t' e)/xein h)na/gkas' o)rgi/wn e)mw=n,

l.#text: kai\ pa=n to\ qh=lu spe/rma *kadmei/wn, o(/sai

l: xlwrai=s u(p' e)la/tais a)noro/fois h(=ntai pe/trais.
dei= ga\r po/lin th/nd' e)kmaqei=n, kei) mh\ qe/lei,

l.#text: *ka/dmos me\n ou)=n ge/ras te kai\ turanni/da
o(\s qeomaxei= ta\ kat' e)me\ kai\ spondw=n a)/po

l: w)qei= m', e)n eu)xai=s t' ou)damou= mnei/an e)/xei.
w(=n ou(/nek' au)tw=| qeo\s gegw\s e)ndei/comai
pa=si/n te *qhbai/oisin. e)s d' a)/llhn xqo/na,
o)rgh=| su\n o(/plois e)c o)/rous ba/kxas a)/gein
w(=n ou(/nek' ei)=dos qnhto\n a)lla/cas e)/xw
morfh/n t' e)mh\n mete/balon ei)s a)ndro\s fu/sin.
qi/asos e)mo/s, gunai=kes, a(\s e)k barba/rwn
tu/mpana, *(re/as te mhtro\s e)ma/ q' eu(rh/mata,

l.#text: basi/leia/ t' a)mfi\ dw/mat' e)lqou=sai ta/de

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: mela/qrois e)/ktopos e)/stw, sto/ma t' eu)/fh-

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ei)s o)/ros ei)s o)/ros, e)/nqa me/nei

nos e)s o)/rea *fru/gia, *lu/di', o( d' e)/carxos *bro/mios,

l: r(ei= de\ ga/lakti pe/don, r(ei= d' oi)/nw|, r(ei= de\ melissa=n

l.#text: foita/sin ei)s o)/ros ei)s o)/ros: h(dome/-

l: na d' a)/ra, pw=los o(/pws a(/ma mate/ri

l.#text: forba/di, kw=lon a)/gei taxu/poun skirth/masi ba/kxa.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as

l.#text: a(/ te cuneqe/mhn pre/sbus w)\n geraite/rw|,

l: qu/rsous a)na/ptein kai\ nebrw=n dora\s e)/xein

sp.speaker: *ka/dmos
l: w)= fi/ltaq', w(s sh\n gh=run h)|sqo/mhn klu/wn
sofh\n sofou= par' a)ndro/s, e)n do/moisin w)/n:

l.#text: h(/kw d' e(/toimos th/nd' e)/xwn skeuh\n qeou=:

o(/son kaq' h(ma=s dunato\n au)/cesqai me/gan.
poi= dei= xoreu/ein, poi= kaqista/nai po/da

l.#text: kai\ kra=ta sei=sai polio/n; e)chgou= su/ moi

l: w(s ou) ka/moim' a)\n ou)/te nu/kt' ou)/q' h(me/ran

sp.l: ou)kou=n o)/xoisin ei)s o)/ros pera/somen;

sp.l: a)ll' ou)x o(moi/ws a)\n o( qeo\s timh\n e)/xoi.

sp.l: ge/rwn ge/ronta paidagwgh/sw s' e)gw/.

sp.l: o( qeo\s a)moxqi\ kei=se nw=|n h(gh/setai.

l: patri/ous paradoxa/s, a(/s q' o(mh/likas xro/nw|
ou)d' ei) di' a)/krwn to\ sofo\n hu(/rhtai frenw=n.
e)rei= tis w(s to\ gh=ras ou)k ai)sxu/nomai,
ou) ga\r dih/|rhx' o( qeo/s, ou)/te to\n ne/on

sp.speaker: *ka/dmos

l.#text: e)pei\ su\ fe/ggos, *teiresi/a, to/d' ou)x o(ra=|s,

l: *penqeu\s pro\s oi)/kous o(/de dia\ spoudh=s pera=|,
w(s e)pto/htai: ti/ pot' e)rei= new/teron;

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s

l.#text: e)/kdhmos w)\n me\n th=sd' e)tu/gxanon xqono/s,

l: klu/w de\ neoxma\ th/nd' a)na\ pto/lin kaka/,
plh/reis de\ qia/sois e)n me/soisin e(sta/nai
krath=ras, a)/llhn d' a)/llos' ei)s e)rhmi/an
pro/fasin me\n w(s dh\ maina/das quosko/ous,

l.#text: o(/sas me\n ou)=n ei)/lhfa, desmi/ous xe/ras

l: o(/sai d' a)/peisin, e)c o)/rous qhra/somai,
kai\ sfa=s sidhrai=s a(rmo/sas e)n a)/rkusin

l.#text: le/gousi d' w(/s tis ei)selh/luqe ce/nos,

l: ei) d' au)to\n ei)/sw th=sde lh/yomai ste/ghs,
tau=t' ou)xi\ deinh=s a)gxo/nhs e)/st' a)/cia,
u(/breis u(bri/zein, o(/stis e)/stin o( ce/nos;

l.#text: a)ta\r to/d' a)/llo qau=ma, to\n terasko/pon
pate/ra te mhtro\s th=s e)mh=s--polu\n ge/lwn--

l: to\ gh=ras u(mw=n ei)sorw=n nou=n ou)k e)/xon.
qu/rsou meqh/seis xei=r', e)mh=s mhtro\s pa/ter;

l.#text: su\ tau=t' e)/peisas, *teiresi/a: to/nd' au)= qe/leis

l: ei) mh/ se gh=ras polio\n e)cerru/eto,
kaqh=s' a)\n e)n ba/kxaisi de/smios me/sais,
o(/pou bo/truos e)n daiti\ gi/gnetai ga/nos,
ou)x u(gie\s ou)de\n e)/ti le/gw tw=n o)rgi/wn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: th=s dussebei/as. w)= ce/n', ou)k ai)dh=| qeou\s

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
l: o(/tan la/bh| tis tw=n lo/gwn a)nh\r sofo\s
kala\s a)forma/s, ou) me/g' e)/rgon eu)= le/gein:
su\ d' eu)/troxon me\n glw=ssan w(s fronw=n e)/xeis,
e)n toi=s lo/goisi d' ou)k e)/neisi/ soi fre/nes.

l.#text: qra/sei de\ dunato\s kai\ le/gein oi(=o/s t' a)nh\r

l: kako\s poli/ths gi/gnetai nou=n ou)k e)/xwn.

l.#text: ou(=tos d' o( dai/mwn o( ne/os, o(\n su\ diagela=|s,

l: ou)k a)\n dunai/mhn me/geqos e)ceipei=n o(/sos
kaq' *(ella/d' e)/stai. du/o ga/r, w)= neani/a,
gh= d' e)sti/n, o)/noma d' o(po/teron bou/lh| ka/lei:
au(/th me\n e)n chroi=sin e)ktre/fei brotou/s:
o(\s d' h)=lq' e)/peit', a)nti/palon o( *seme/lhs go/nos

l.#text: qnhtoi=s, o(\ pau/ei tou\s talaipw/rous brotou\s

l: u(/pnon te lh/qhn tw=n kaq' h(me/ran kakw=n
di/dwsin, ou)d' e)/st' a)/llo fa/rmakon po/nwn.

l.#text: w(/ste dia\ tou=ton ta)ga/q' a)nqrw/pous e)/xein.

l: mhrw=|; dida/cw s' w(s kalw=s e)/xei to/de.
e)pei/ nin h(/rpas' e)k puro\s kerauni/ou
r(h/cas me/ros ti tou= xqo/n' e)gkukloume/nou

l.#text: ma/ntis d' o( dai/mwn o(/de: to\ ga\r bakxeu/simon

l: kai\ to\ maniw=des mantikh\n pollh\n e)/xei:

l.#text: o(/tan ga\r o( qeo\s e)s to\ sw=m' e)/lqh| polu/s,

l: le/gein to\ me/llon tou\s memhno/tas poiei=.
strato\n ga\r e)n o(/plois o)/nta ka)pi\ ta/cesin

l.#text: mani/a de\ kai\ tou=t' e)sti\ *dionu/sou pa/ra.

l: me/gan t' a)n' *(ella/da. a)ll' e)moi/, *penqeu=, piqou=:

l.#text: mh\ to\ kra/tos au)/xei du/namin a)nqrw/pois e)/xein,

l: mhd', h)\n dokh=|s me/n, h( de\ do/ca sou nosh=|,
fronei=n do/kei ti: to\n qeo\n d' e)s gh=n de/xou
kai\ spe/nde kai\ ba/kxeue kai\ ste/fou ka/ra.

l.#text: gunai=kas e)s th\n *ku/prin, a)ll' e)n th=| fu/sei

l: to\ swfronei=n e)/nestin ei)s ta\ pa/nt' a)ei/
tou=to skopei=n xrh/: kai\ ga\r e)n bakxeu/masin
ou)=s' h(/ ge sw/frwn ou) diafqarh/setai.

l.#text: o(ra=|s, su\ xai/reis, o(/tan e)festw=sin pu/lais
polloi/, to\ *penqe/ws d' o)/noma megalu/nh| po/lis:

l: e)gw\ me\n ou)=n kai\ *ka/dmos, o(\n su\ diagela=|s,

l.#text: kou) qeomaxh/sw sw=n lo/gwn peisqei\s u(/po.

l: mai/nh| ga\r w(s a)/lgista, kou)/te farma/kois
a)/kh la/bois a)\n ou)/t' a)/neu tou/twn nosei=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: w)= pre/sbu, *foi=bo/n t' ou) kataisxu/neis lo/gois,
